record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1929. Sixth row: Dr. C.O. Molander, N. H. Norgren, A. A. Stagg (coach), S. Benson, and H. O. Crisler; fifth row: A. J. Brislen; fourth row: J. C. Bunge, T. Cowley, P. Stagg, H. Boesel, G. W. Cassle, J. M. Temple, R. A. MacNeille, B. Wien, and S. H. Hamberg; third row: M. E. Sonderby, H. Bluhm, H. Jersild, D. M. Greer, and W. S. Trude; second row: S. J. Horwitz, E. I. Van Nice, J. M. Kelly (captain), L. C. Marshall, C. A. Weaver, and K. B. Mackenzie; first row: G. W. Heywood, W. A. Knudson, W. F. Burgess, B. S. Wattenberg, and F. H. Froberg.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
